articles.description: Follow live text and scores updates as Manchester United, Tottenham Hotspur and Chelsea feature in the first legs of the Europa League & Conference League semi-finals.
articles.title: Europa League & Conference League LIVE: Man Utd, Tottenham & Chelsea - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Nottingham Forest vs Brentford in the Premier League
articles.title: Nottingham Forest vs Brentford LIVE: Premier League score, team news & updates

articles.description: Transgender women will no longer be able to play in women's football in England following a policy change from the Football Association.
articles.title: FA says transgender women cannot compete in women's football from 1 June

articles.description: If Manchester United do not win the Europa League, what is the cost to the club on missing out on Champions League income again?
articles.title: What is the cost if Man Utd miss out on Champions League qualification?

articles.description: Coco Gauff produces a stunning display to thrash four-time French Open champion Iga Swiatek 6-1 6-1 and reach the final of the Madrid Open.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Coco Gauff thrashes Iga Swiatek to reach final

articles.description: The Los Angeles Lakers exit the NBA play-offs at the first hurdle as the Minnesota Timberwolves complete a 4-1 series victory.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: LA Lakers knocked out by Minnesota Timberwolves

articles.description: Britain's Olympic champion Keely Hodgkinson will return from injury to race in the women's 800m at this summer's London Athletics Meet on Saturday 19 July.
articles.title: Keely Hodgkinson: Olympic champion to return at London Stadium

articles.description: Bodo/Glimt have risen from the Norway second division to upsetting the odds in Europe and face Tottenham on Thursday looking to take a big step towards the Europa League final.
articles.title: Bodo/Glimt: Norwegian side aiming to upset Ange Postecoglou again

articles.description: Seven-time champion Ronnie O'Sullivan is level at 4-4 with Zhao Xintong after an entertaining opening session to their World Championship semi-final.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: O'Sullivan and Zhao level in first semi-final

articles.description: Manchester United face Athletic Club on Thursday at San Mames, the unique and iconic Bilbao venue that will also host the Europa League final.
articles.title: Athletic Club v Manchester United: Into the Lions' den - spiritual San Mames awaits Man Utd in Bilbao
